jump_scares.spoiler: A blue light appears in the fireplace out of nowhere and makes a loud sound
A glowing white figure appears in the camera, which startles Mike
A sudden bang on the window startles Manuel and Altair
Manuel turns around with the camera, and Altair is standing right in front of him
Manuel turns the camera down from the ceiling and spots Altair standing in front of him with her back turned
While unresponsively sitting on a chair and looking down, Altair suddenly grabs the camera as Manuel points it at her
A door suddenly slams shut on its own
While lying on the floor, Altair suddenly springs upwards and begins to scream
The ceiling lamp suddenly explodes
While Altair plays with something bloody in her hands, an inhuman hand suddenly reaches and grabs her
A body falls down from the stairwell next to a group of people on the ground floor
Someone runs through the door space
One of the infected slams against the glass door from the other side
The little girl attacks the police officer
An infected lady jumps into the centre of the hallway
A hand bursts through some glass grabbing one of the men
The light on the camera turns on revealing an infected person

The camera spins around in the attic where a boy’s face appears. [Video]

Ángela screams as she is suddenly dragged away
Mirroring the final jump scare from the first film, Angela is pulled back into the darkness

Martos, now an infected, lunges at the camera

An infected girl appears at the end of the hallway

Ori fires a second shot

Lane suddenly appears in front of Talia and James
Something appears to pull Peter away and the camera footage cuts out

James startles Lisa
The camera gradually approaches the back of Talia’s head and she suddenly screams
A branch snaps and a hysterical Talia appears in front of James
A tent flies into the air

A flash of lightning illuminates the room and a woman can briefly be seen watching James

Lane runs at Lisa while screaming

After the results of the poll show Matias is to die, a van suddenly collides with him. (An alternative ending exists that lacks this jump scare with Matias instead being buried alive)
There is a short scream and the webcam, which was focused on Val, suddenly falls to the ground
There is a loud thud and the webcam moves to Val’s motionless body lying on the ground
There are several seconds of broken video from Ken’s webcam which show a distressed Ken being slammed into the computer desk and putting his hands and face in a blender
Jess’s webcam shows a brief image of her crouching on the bathroom floor screaming. Several seconds later the webcam shows Jess with a hair straightener in her mouth
Hands reach down and close the laptop screen, accompanied by a loud NO!, a few seconds later the ghost of Laura lunges at the screen
The ice cream truck quickly drives in from the side and runs over a cop
There is a sudden loud shriek and the woman on the bed is flung to the side
Demonic hands suddenly appear out of the cape and grab Scarlett
The door to the gate suddenly flies upwards by itself
The cameraman suddenly screams as a bone cracking sound is heard, followed by him turning back to the woman who rips his arm out
The camera suddenly shatters as the cameraman is stabbed
A cloud of dust shoots out of the sewer gate as a growl is heard
While the camera is lying on the ground, a cloud of dust shoots into screen from the side after a few seconds
The ice cream truck suddenly begins blasting music which startles Kev
An eye appears in the man’s belongings
A man appears in front of the camera
Banging from the coffin knocks things over
Mr. Edwards turns around
Hayley looks around with the camera and a severed hand moving around on its own causes her to scream
Hayley looks up from the ground and Mr. Edwards is running straight at her
One of the soldiers reaches out for the woman who quickly grabs him on the arm
There is a sudden loud noise during a quiet scene as someone gets attacked in another room
The police officer appears behind her
The subject runs into frame and rams into the soldier from the side
A strange creature eats a man’s face
The creature reappears
Loud noise from silence as a man plugs in a microphone
A raccoon makes a noise
Something hits the side of Kelly & Jim’s tent
Something hits the side of Kelly and Jim’s tent
Something crashes down in the forest behind Kelly
Something jumps from behind a bush at Kelly
Something makes a noise in the forest behind Kelly and Jim
Something breaks a stick in the forest near the characters
Naked woman appears moaning
Something drags camera away from frame
Hank suddenly shouts “I’m sorry.” While not a jump scare, it is sudden and extremely loud, enough to clip the microphone
Emma puts the camera down and as she moves out of the center point, the Slenderman is revealed to be standing right behind her
As Emma backs out of the school driveway, Chase points the camera at the Slenderman standing behind the building, followed by the camera glitching and an extremely loud yell
Hank turns around to look at Danny and the Slenderman is standing right behind him
A stack of hay suddenly falls in front of Emma
Emma turns around and the Slenderman is standing behind her
Chase shines the phone’s flashlight on the Slenderman
Kyle suddenly fires the gun
All of the screens suddenly turn into a close-up of the Slenderman
